trans-unit.source: Provides a Message Queuing internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 提供消息队列内部事务。

trans-unit.source: To send or receive a message as part of a transaction, you can use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> class to create a transaction and pass it to an overload of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method or the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method that takes a `transaction` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要发送或接收消息作为事务的一部分，你可以使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction>类创建一个事务，并将其传递给的重载<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>采用的方法`transaction`参数。

trans-unit.source: Messages sent as part of a transaction must be sent to transactional queues.
trans-unit.target: 作为事务一部分发送的消息必须发送到事务性队列。

trans-unit.source: Messages received from transactional queues must be received using a specified transaction.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用指定的事务接收从事务性队列接收的消息。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method, you can receive messages with a specified identifier or specified correlation identifier.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法，你可以接收与指定的标识符或指定的相关标识符的消息。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%2A> methods for more information about selectively receiving messages from transactional queues.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%2A>有关有选择地从事务性队列接收消息的详细信息的方法。

trans-unit.source: Messages sent to transactional queues are removed if the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将提交事务不会发送到事务性队列的消息。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, messages received from transactional queues are returned to the queue if the transaction is rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 同样，从事务性队列接收的消息将返回到队列中，如果事务回滚。

trans-unit.source: If you instantiate a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> and pass it to an applicable overload of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> method or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method to send a message to a non-transactional queue or receive a message from a non-transactional queue, the method throws an exception that indicates "Wrong Transaction Usage."
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction>并将其传递到适用的重载<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>方法或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>向非事务性队列发送消息或从非事务性队列，该方法接收一条消息的方法引发的异常指示"事务用法错误。"

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> 线程处理单元感知，因此，如果你的单元状态`STA`，不能在多个线程中使用的事务。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> in the `Main` subroutine.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 将设置到的主线程的状态`STA`，因此您必须首先应用<xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute>中`Main`子例程。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueException> 异常。

trans-unit.source: You apply the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> by using the following fragment.
trans-unit.target: 你将应用<xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute>通过使用下面的片段。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A> property to `Initialized`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A>属性`Initialized`。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back the pending internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 回滚正挂起的内部事务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> marks the unsuccessful completion of a process begun at a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> 将标记始于调用的进程的未成功完成<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, one makes a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> within a `Try...Catch` exception-handling block, putting a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A> in the `Try` clause, and a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> in the `Catch` clause.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，一个方法调用了<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>内`Try...Catch`异常处理块中，将调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A>中`Try`子句，并且调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>中`Catch`子句。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> rolls back the entire transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> 回滚整个事务。

trans-unit.source: This includes all messages sent or received after the call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括所有消息后调用发送或接收<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The internal transaction you are attempting to roll back has not started.
trans-unit.target: 您正尝试回滚的内部事务尚未开始。

trans-unit.source: An internal Message Queuing error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 发生内部消息队列错误。

trans-unit.source: Begins a new Message Queuing internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始新的消息队列内部事务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> marks the start of processing that will be committed or rolled back, depending on the success of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> 标记处理将提交或回滚，具体取决于事务成功的开始。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs during processing, the entire transaction is rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理期间发生异常，将回滚整个事务。

trans-unit.source: This includes all messages sent or received after the call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括所有消息后调用发送或接收<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, one makes a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> within a `Try...Catch` exception-handling block, putting a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A> in the `Try` clause, and a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> in the `Catch` clause.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，一个方法调用了<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>内`Try...Catch`异常处理块中，将调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A>中`Try`子句，并且调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>中`Catch`子句。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 事务已开始。

trans-unit.source: An internal Message Queuing error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 发生内部消息队列错误。

trans-unit.source: Commits a pending internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 提交正挂起的内部事务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A> marks the successful completion of processing begun at a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A> 将标记处理始于调用成功完成<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs between the call the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> and the call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A>, the entire transaction is rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用之间发生的异常<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>和对<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A>，回滚整个事务。

trans-unit.source: This includes all messages sent or received after the call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括所有消息后调用发送或接收<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, one makes a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> within a `Try...Catch` exception-handling block, putting a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A> in the `Try` clause, and a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A> in the `Catch` clause.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，一个方法调用了<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>内`Try...Catch`异常处理块中，将调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A>中`Try`子句，并且调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>中`Catch`子句。

trans-unit.source: The transaction you are trying to commit has not started.
trans-unit.target: 尚未开始正尝试提交的事务。

trans-unit.source: An internal Message Queuing error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 发生内部消息队列错误。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose%2A>允许使用的资源<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction>可以重新分配用于其他目的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Any pending internal transactions are rolled back by <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 任何挂起的内部事务将回滚<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see langword="Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see langword="Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources held by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 释放由当前实例所持有的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Finalize%2A>方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取事务的状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionStatus" /> values that indicates whether the transaction has been committed, aborted, initialized, or is pending.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionStatus" /> 值之一，指示事务是否已被提交、中止、初始化或正被挂起。

trans-unit.source: When an instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> class has been created, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A> is set by the constructor to `Initialized`.
trans-unit.target: 实例时<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction>已创建类，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A>到构造函数设置`Initialized`。

trans-unit.source: After a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A> but before a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A> is `Pending`.
trans-unit.target: 调用了<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Begin%2A>但在调用之前<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>、<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A>是`Pending`。
